actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Labor Relations Act to make certain limitations on penalties levied by a labor organization upon its members, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Labor Organization Penalties Limitation Act - Provides, under the National Labor Relations Act, that it is an unfair labor practice for a labor organization to levy a fine on any person for exercising rights under this Act or for carrying out lawful instructions of his employer.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Labor Relations Act to make certain limitations on penalties levied by a labor organization upon its members, and for other purposes.
